Bic:

Tucson transforms and gestures to Straightshot who is still on Leo's =
shoulder.  She replies back to him using the same language.

" He says you'=
re doing well, keep it up.  He's gonna lead us out through another tunnel, =
one he noticed when he was separated from us.  Be ready, phase two is now i=
n action. And remind he says remind him ta teach you sign language when thi=
ngs quiet down."

Tucson grins.

" You want to arrest me?  Then you will ha=
ve to catch me first.  That's if you can catch me."

He makes a dash for th=
e tunnel which he intends to show them the alternate route out of the cave.=


" I hope Leo is getting all of this.  It's the only way I know how to foo=
l Magmatron."
